recipesJson.name: Raspberry Nog Milk
recipesJson.author: Seakow
recipesJson.description: I've never really been able to taste strawberry and I was already playing around with Wild Raspberry and I was wanting to try FLV Egg Nog. So I decided to try it with Strawberry Nog Milk by Grfyman, I think I finally found something that will help bring out strawberry for me.
